properties.name: parser.java.auto-analyze-on-startup
properties.description: Enable or disable automatic project analysis when the application starts up.

properties.name: parser.java.project-path
properties.description: The root path of the Java project to analyze. If not specified, uses the application's working directory.

properties.name: parser.java.parallel-analysis
properties.description: Enable parallel analysis for improved performance on multi-core systems.

properties.name: parser.java.thread-pool-size
properties.description: The number of threads to use for parallel analysis. Defaults to the number of available processors.

properties.name: parser.java.analyze-dependencies
properties.description: Enable dependency analysis to detect coupling, circular dependencies, and dependency graphs.

properties.name: parser.java.analyze-metrics
properties.description: Enable code metrics analysis including complexity, maintainability, and quality scores.

properties.name: parser.java.generate-graphs
properties.description: Enable generation of dependency graphs and visual representations.

properties.name: parser.java.api-path
properties.description: The base path for the parser REST API endpoints.

properties.name: parser.java.view-path
properties.description: The path for the parser web view dashboard endpoint.

properties.name: parser.java.enable-web-view
properties.description: Enable or disable the web view dashboard for visualizing analysis results.
